蜹字的基本解释

蜹
ruì
蠛蠓：“??酸而蜹聚焉。”
古同“蚋”：“蜹蚁蜂虿，皆能害人。”

蜹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruì］
［《集韻》儒税切，去祭，日。］
亦作“蜹1”。
蚊类害虫。体形似蝇而小，吸人畜血液。

蜹字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蜹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1087第34
【唐韻】而銳切【集韻】儒銳切【正韻】儒稅切，?音芮。【說文】秦、晉謂之蜹，楚謂之蚊。【孟子】蠅蜹姑嘬之。【荀子·勸學篇】醯酸而蜹聚焉。【大戴禮】白鳥者謂蚊蜹也。　又【集韻】如劣切，音爇。義同。　又【廣韻】以芮切，音叡。毒蟲名。【玉篇】含毒蛇也。　或作蚋。

蜹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蜹字的起名意思

暂无。

Centipede
Basic explanation of words
Centipede
ruì
Midges: "?? Sour and gather together."
Gu Tong "Gnat": "Any ants and bees can harm people."
Centipede
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ruì］
["Jiyun" Confucian tax cut, go to sacrifice, day. ]
Also known as "Crimping 1".
Mosquito pests. It looks like a fly and is small, sucking blood from humans and animals.
Centipede
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蜹; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1087 Page 34
[Tang Yun] and sharp cut [Ji Yun] Confucian sharp cut [Zheng Yun] Confucian tax cut,? Yin Rui. [Said the text] Qin and Jin are called the chrysalis, and the Chu is called the mosquito. 【Mencius】Gun of Flies. 【Xunzi·Encourage Learning】to be sour and to get together. 【Big Wearing Ceremony】The white bird is also called the mosquito.　[Jiyun] Such as inferior cut, sound 爇. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Yi Ruiqie, Yin Rui. The name of the poisonous insect. [Jade articles] There are also poisonous snakes.　Or as a gnat.
